715846f-a.text:
Avenue A, east side, from near 2nd to 3rd Streets.

June 11, 1933.

P.L. Sperr, Photographer.

710843f-a.text:
East 2nd Street, west from and including Ave. A. The view shows the spire of the R.C. Church of St. Nicholas, on the south side of East 2nd
Street. Note the Second Ave. Elevated on First Ave.

April 3, 1935.
P.L. Sperr.

715847f-b.text:
(1) Avenue A, west side, from 2nd to 3rd Streets. April 3,1935. P.L. Sperr, photographer.
(2) Avenue A, west side, from 3rd to 2nd Streets, showing start of demolition of buildings shown in No. 1. April 26, 1935. P.L. Sperr, photographer.

715847f-a.text:
(1) Avenue A, west side, from 2nd to 3rd Streets. April 3,1935. P.L. Sperr, photographer.
(2) Avenue A, west side, from 3rd to 2nd Streets, showing start of demolition of buildings shown in No. 1. April 26, 1935. P.L. Sperr, photographer.

1558126-a.title: 148-152 East 2nd Street - Avenue A
1558126-a.folder: 148-152 East 2nd Street - Avenue A, Manhattan, NY

715848f-a.text:
(1)
Ave. A. west side, north from 2nd to 3rd Streets.  The view shows work in progress, for the new Astor slum clearance project, at the S.W. corner of East 3rd Street.

August 16, 1935
P. L. Sperr

(2)
The same; another view, showing the work at the S.W. corner of Ave. A. and East 3rd Street.

August 16, 1935
P. L. Sperr

Neg. # 993
